name: mpromise
description: A Promises/A+ implement. Read https://promisesaplus.com/ for more.
author: zendo

scripts.build: npm run build:default && npm run build:extend
scripts.build:default: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/index.js --global Promise
scripts.build:extend: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/extend.js --global Promise
scripts.test: babel src/** test/** -d es5 && node es5/test/aplus_test.js
